description: This course develops comprehension in relation to the construction regulatory environment, structural principles, construction systems and detailing, and technical documentation. Students extend knowledge of structural principles, building products and construction systems through activities and assignments that also develop skills in design detailing for small to medium-scale buildings.
prerequisites: Year 1 of the Bachelor of Architectural Design or equivalent
restricted: Admission to the Bachelor of Architectural Design. Study abroad students must seek head of School's permission to enrol.
